body.codeblock: <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1754857011"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <code code="67481-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Name of first unit on scene"/> <value xsi:type="ST">TEXT FOR VALUE</value> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <code code="67490-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Mass Casualty Incident Indicator"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entry> </section>
